snippet: Missteps aside, the state cannot afford to let this project founder.
abstract: Editorial holds New York Gov Andrew Cuomo must not allow new Common Core learning standards to founder despite bumpy rollout and opposition by parents, union leaders and other critics; says government must do a better job clearing up public confusion and misconceptions about the tougher standards.
lead_paragraph: Missteps aside, the state cannot afford to let this project founder.

headline.main: The Common Core in New York
headline.print_headline: The Common Core in New York
